dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S2906 IS: Expanding American Entrepreneurship Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Moran (for himself, Mr. Warner, Mr. Scott of South Carolina, and Mr. Gallego) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

form.official-title: To amend the Investment Company Act of 1940 to address entities that are not considered to be investment companies for the purposes of that Act, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Expanding American Entrepreneurship Act.
Section 3(c)(1) of the Investment Company Act of 1940 (15 U.S.C. 80a–3(c)(1)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in the matter preceding subparagraph (A), in the first sentence, by striking 250 persons and inserting 500 persons; and
in subparagraph (C)(i), by striking $10,000,000 and inserting $50,000,000.
